Batik Maven Plugin

  • Organizational POM
  • Coding standards
  • Commons testing
  • Java archetype
  • Other projects

batik:ttf2svg

Full name:

net.trajano.mojo:batik-maven-plugin:1.0.2-SNAPSHOT:ttf2svg

Description:

Executes the Batik Font converter.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • The goal is thread-safe and supports parallel builds.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: generate-resources.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
destDir File - The directory to write the SVG files converted from TTFs.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/generated-resources/ttf2svg.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
fontFileSets List - A list of font file sets to import. Filtering is not supported on fonts. The default is: 
<fontFileSets>
    <fileSet>
        <directory>${basedir}/src/main/ttf</directory>
        <includes>
            <include>**\/\*.ttf</include>
        </includes>
        <excludes>
        </excludes>
    </fileSet>
</fontFileSets>

Parameter Details

destDir:

The directory to write the SVG files converted from TTFs.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/generated-resources/ttf2svg

fontFileSets:

A list of font file sets to import. Filtering is not supported on fonts. The default is: 
<fontFileSets>
    <fileSet>
        <directory>${basedir}/src/main/ttf</directory>
        <includes>
            <include>**\/\*.ttf</include>
        </includes>
        <excludes>
        </excludes>
    </fileSet>
</fontFileSets>
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No

Last Published: 2014-07-12
Version: 1.0.2-SNAPSHOT
